Name: Candyboy
About the game: It's Halloween night - a time for fear and fright. For tricks and treats. A time... to dine on candy! Join Candyboy on his quest to gather as many sweets as he can before the night is through. But look out! Danger lurks around every corner, and even Candyboy has reason to be afraid. Features Inspired by the old school, tough as nails NES platformers Multiple endings Platformer PACIFICISM! Candyboy can't beat up his bullies, so he evades them instead 6 enemies to beware of, from bad bullies to rabid bats Cool chiptunes to listen to A fun time for audiences of all ages Enjoy the sweetest game of the year with Candyboy!
